title: Engineer?
body: How bout a hextech engineer who fights people with a big wrench?

replies.body:
he's an inventor
there is a difference. 
I was thinking his kit would revolve around tethering enemies together with wire.

> he's an inventor
> there is a difference. 
> I was thinking his kit would revolve around tethering enemies together with wire.

You mean an Electrician?
